name: Stardust Robe
description: The robes that astrologists like to wear.

description: The robes that astrologists like to wear.

name: Stardust Rose
description: The power of the Shinewhole, condensed into petals, its memories crystalized into buds. When the rose blooms, the dream comes to an end.

name: Starlight
description: All the shining stars upon the sky, which one you have seen it falling.

name: Starlight Ship
description: "Hold the moon in your hand, enjoy the scenery at might." "Each flower will comes to an end, what now exists will last forever." Under the illustrious moon, the beautiful picture, the boat on roaring sea, the blessing stars all come in this season of sakura.

name: Starry Sky Meteor
description: A meteor fallen from the starry sky lies hidden in the deep valley.

name: Starry Sky Wheat Head
description: Wheat growing in the starry sky is an unusual sight.  Stars dots the sky after an autumn harvest.

name: Static Shield
description: A heavy half-body shield. It cannot be widely used because of the heavy weight.
